sx.blah.discord.handle.obj

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.User

  • public class User
extends Object
    This class defines the Discord user.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String avatar
      The user's avatar location.
      protected String avatarURL
      The user's avatar in URL form.
      protected IDiscordClient client
      The client that created this object.
      protected String discriminator
      User discriminator.
      protected Optional<String> game
      The game the user is playing.
      protected String id
      User ID.
      protected String name
      Display name of the user.
      protected Presences presence
      This user's presence.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        protected String name
        Display name of the user.

      • avatar

        protected String avatar
        The user's avatar location.

      • game

        protected Optional<String> game
        The game the user is playing.

      • id

        protected final String id
        User ID.

      • discriminator

        protected final String discriminator
        User discriminator. Distinguishes users with the same name. This is here in case it becomes necessary.

      • presence

        protected Presences presence
        This user's presence. One of [online/idle/offline].

      • avatarURL

        protected String avatarURL
        The user's avatar in URL form.

      • client

        protected final IDiscordClient client
        The client that created this object.
